verses.verse: And when Rachel <WH7354> saw <WH7200> that she gave birth to <WH3205> Jacob <WH3290> no sons Rachel <WH7354> envied <WH7065> her sister <WH269>; and said <WH559> unto Jacob <WH3290>, Give <WH3051> me sons <WH1121>, or else <WH369> I die <WH4191>.

And Jacob <WH3290>'s anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> against Rachel <WH7354>: and he said <WH559>, Am I in God <WH430>'s stead <WH4513>, who has withheld from you the fruit <WH6529> of the womb <WH990>?
And she said <WH559>, Behold my maid <WH519> Bilhah <WH1090>, go in <WH935> unto her <WH3205>; and she shall bear upon my knees <WH1290>, that I may also have sons by her <WH1129>.
And she gave <WH5414> him Bilhah <WH1090> her handmaid <WH8198> to wife <WH802>: and Jacob <WH3290> went in unto her <WH935>.
And Bilhah <WH1090> conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> Jacob <WH3290> a son <WH1121>.

And Rachel <WH7354> said <WH559>, God <WH430> has judged <WH1777> me <WH8085>, and has also heard my voice <WH6963>, and has given <WH5414> me a son <WH1121>: therefore called <WH7121> she his name <WH8034> Dan <WH1835>.
And Bilhah <WH1090> Rachel <WH7354>'s maid <WH8198> conceived <WH2029> again <WH3205>, and gave birth to Jacob <WH3290> a second <WH8145> son <WH1121>.

And Rachel <WH7354> said <WH559>, With great <WH430> wrestlings <WH5319> have I wrestled <WH6617> with my sister <WH269>, and I have prevailed <WH3201>: and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Naphtali <WH5321>.
When Leah <WH3812> saw <WH7200> that she had left <WH5975> bearing <WH3205>, she took <WH3947> Zilpah <WH2153> her maid <WH8198>, and gave <WH5414> her Jacob <WH3290> to wife <WH802>.
And Zilpah <WH2153> Leah <WH3812>'s maid <WH8198> gave birth to <WH3205> Jacob <WH3290> a son <WH1121>.
And Leah <WH3812> said <WH559>, A troop <WH1409> comes <WH935>: and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Gad <WH1410>.
And Zilpah <WH2153> Leah <WH3812>'s maid <WH8198> gave birth to <WH3205> Jacob <WH3290> a second <WH8145> son <WH1121>.
And Leah <WH3812> said <WH559>, Happy am I <WH837>, for the daughters <WH1323> will call me blessed <WH833>: and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Asher <WH836>.

And Reuben <WH7205> went in <WH3212> the days <WH3117> of wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105>, and found <WH4672> mandrakes <WH1736> in the field <WH7704>, and brought <WH935> them unto his mother <WH517> Leah <WH3812>. Then Rachel <WH7354> said <WH559> to Leah <WH3812>, Give me <WH5414>, I pray you of your son <WH1121>'s mandrakes <WH1736>.

And she said <WH559> unto her <WH4592>, Is it a small matter that you have taken <WH3947> my husband <WH376>? and would you take away <WH3947> my son <WH1121>'s mandrakes <WH1736> also <WH7354>? And Rachel said <WH559>, Therefore he shall lie <WH7901> with you to night <WH3915> for <WH8478> your son <WH1121>'s mandrakes <WH1736>.

And Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> out of the field <WH7704> in the evening <WH6153>, and Leah <WH3812> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him <WH559>, and said, you must come in <WH935> unto me <WH7936>; for surely I have hired <WH7936> you with my son <WH1121>'s mandrakes <WH1736>. And he lay <WH7901> with her that night <WH3915>.
And God <WH430> listened <WH8085> unto Leah <WH3812>, and she conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> Jacob <WH3290> the fifth <WH2549> son <WH1121>.

And Leah <WH3812> said <WH559>, God <WH430> has given <WH5414> me my hire <WH7939>, because <WH834> I have given <WH5414> my maiden <WH8198> to my husband <WH376>: and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Issachar <WH3485>.
And Leah <WH3812> conceived <WH2029> again <WH3205>, and gave birth to Jacob <WH3290> the sixth <WH8345> son <WH1121>.

And Leah <WH3812> said <WH559>, God <WH430> has endowed <WH2064> me with a good <WH2896> dowry <WH2065>; now <WH6471> will my husband <WH376> live <WH2082> with me <WH3205>, because I have born him six <WH8337> sons <WH1121>: and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Zebulun <WH2074>.
And afterwards <WH310> she gave birth to <WH3205> a daughter <WH1323>, and called <WH7121> her name <WH8034> Dinah <WH1783>.
And God <WH430> remembered <WH2142> Rachel <WH7354>, and God <WH430> listened <WH8085> to her <WH6605>, and opened her womb <WH7358>.
And she conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and said <WH559>, God <WH430> has taken away <WH622> my reproach <WH2781>:
And she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Joseph <WH3130>; and said <WH559>, The Lord <WH3068> shall add <WH3254> to me another <WH312> son <WH1121>.

And it came to pass <WH7354>, when Rachel had born <WH3205> Joseph <WH3130>, that Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto Laban <WH3837>, Send me away <WH7971>, that I may go <WH3212> unto my own place <WH4725>, and to my country <WH776>.
Give <WH5414> me my wives <WH802> and my sons <WH3206>, for <WH2004> whom I have served <WH5647> you and let me go <WH3212>: for you know <WH3045> my service <WH5656> which I have done you <WH5647>

And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> unto him <WH4672>, I pray you if I have found favor <WH2580> in your eyes <WH5869>, tarry <WH5172>: for I have learned by experience that the Lord <WH3068> has blessed <WH1288> me for your sake <WH1558>.
And he said <WH559>, Appoint <WH5344> me your wages <WH7939>, and I will give it <WH5414>.
And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3045>, You know how <WH834> I have served <WH5647> you and how <WH834> your cattle was with me <WH4735>.

For it was little <WH4592> which you had before I <WH6440> came <WH6555>, and it is now increased unto a multitude <WH7230>; and the Lord <WH3068> has blessed <WH1288> you since my coming <WH7272>: and now when <WH4970> shall I provide <WH6213> for my own house also <WH1004>?

And he said <WH559>, What shall I give you <WH5414>? And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559>, you shall not give <WH5414> me any thing <WH3972>: if you will do <WH6213> this thing <WH1697> for me <WH7725>, I will again feed <WH7462> and keep <WH8104> your flock <WH6629>:

I will pass <WH5674> through all your flock <WH6629> to day <WH3117>, removing <WH5493> from there all the speckled <WH5348> and spotted <WH2921> cattle <WH7716>, and all the brown <WH2345> cattle <WH7716> among the sheep <WH3775>, and the spotted <WH2921> and speckled <WH5348> among the goats <WH5795>: and of such shall be my hire <WH7939>.

So shall my righteousness <WH6666> answer <WH6030> for me in time <WH3117> to come <WH4279>, when it shall come <WH935> for my hire <WH7939> before your face <WH6440>: every one <WH3605> that is not speckled <WH5348> and spotted <WH2921> among the goats <WH5795>, and brown <WH2345> among the sheep <WH3775>, that shall be counted stolen with me <WH1589>.
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559>, Behold <WH3863>, I would it might be according to your word <WH1697>.

And he removed <WH5493> that day <WH3117> the he goats <WH8495> that were streaked <WH6124> and spotted <WH2921>, and all the she goats <WH5795> that were speckled <WH5348> and spotted <WH2921>, and every one that had some white <WH3836> in it <WH2345>, and all the brown among the sheep <WH3775>, and gave <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of his sons <WH1121>.
And he set <WH7760> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870> between himself and Jacob <WH3290>: and Jacob <WH3290> fed <WH7462> the rest <WH3498> of Laban <WH3837>'s flocks <WH6629>.

And Jacob <WH3290> took <WH3947> him rods <WH4731> of green <WH3892> poplar <WH3839>, and of the hazel <WH3869> and chesnut tree <WH6196>; and peeled <WH6478> white <WH3836> streaks <WH6479> in them <WH3836>, and made the white appear <WH4286> which was in the rods <WH4731>.

And he set <WH3322> the rods <WH4731> which he had peeled <WH6478> before <WH5227> the flocks <WH6629> in the gutters <WH7298> in the watering <WH4325> troughs <WH8268> when the flocks <WH6629> came <WH935> to drink <WH8354>, that they should conceive <WH3179> when they came <WH935> to drink <WH8354>.
And the flocks <WH6629> conceived <WH3179> before the rods <WH4731>, and brought forth <WH3205> cattle <WH6629> streaked <WH6124>, speckled <WH5348>, and spotted <WH2921>.

And Jacob <WH3290> did separate <WH6504> the lambs <WH3775>, and set <WH5414> the faces <WH6440> of the flocks <WH6629> toward <WH413> the streaked <WH6124>, and all the brown <WH2345> in the flock <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837>; and he put <WH7896> his own flocks <WH5739> by themselves <WH7896>, and put them not unto Laban <WH3837>'s cattle <WH6629>.

And it came to pass <WH7194>, whensoever the stronger cattle <WH6629> did conceive <WH3179>, that Jacob <WH3290> laid <WH7760> the rods <WH4731> before the eyes <WH5869> of the cattle <WH6629> in the gutters <WH7298>, that they might conceive <WH3179> among the rods <WH4731>.
But when the cattle <WH6629> were feeble <WH5848>, he put them not in <WH7760>: so the feebler <WH5848> were Laban <WH3837>'s, and the stronger <WH7194> Jacob <WH3290>'s.
And the man <WH376> increased <WH6555> exceedingly <WH3966>, and had much <WH7227> cattle <WH6629>, and maidservants <WH8198>, and menservants <WH5650>, and camels <WH1581>, and donkeys <WH2543>.
